data.comment: The match has started.
Kawasaki are coming forward and Hidemasa Morita gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Hiroshima at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Kawasaki's Manabu Saito misses with an attempt on goal.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 7, Hiroshima drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Kawasaki pushes forward through Shintaro Kurumaya, whose finish on goal is saved.
Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Hiroshima.
Throw-in high up the field for Kawasaki in Kawasaki.
Goal! Ao Tanaka gives Kawasaki a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 14, Miki Yamane instrumental with a fine assist.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Kawasaki drive upfield and Manabu Saito gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hiroshima defender.
Kazuya Yamamura (Kawasaki) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Hiroshima.
Hiroshima drives forward and Leandro Pereira gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Kawasaki's Manabu Saito attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Hiroshima at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
In the minute 40, Leandro Pereira of Hiroshima is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kawasaki.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
Kawasaki make their first substitution with Ryota Ohshima replacing Yasuto Wakizaka.
In the minute 46, Kaoru Mitoma is on a sub for Reo Hatate for Kawasaki.
Kawasaki take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Leandro Damiao.
Great play from Kaoru Mitoma to set up the goal.
In the minute 49, Free kick Kawasaki.
Kawasaki takes a corner from the right.
Goal! Kawasaki extend their lead to 3-0 through Kazuya Yamamura.
In the minute 51, The away team replace Douglas Vieira with Ezequiel.
Yusuke Chajima is replacing Tsukasa Morishima for the away team.
Ao Tanaka puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-0.
In the minute 51, Manabu Saito with an assist there.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Kawasaki.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Hiroshima are pushing forward but Yusuke Chajima's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, The away team replace Rhayner with Yuya Asano.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
Kaoru Mitoma (Kawasaki) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 68, Kawasaki takes a corner from the left.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 71, Yu Kobayashi is replacing Leandro Damiao for the home team.
Kawasaki make their third substitution with Taisei Miyashiro replacing Manabu Saito.
Shunki Higashi is on a sub for Yoshifumi Kashiwa for Hiroshima.
In the minute 73, Kosei Shibasaki is replacing Toshihiro Aoyama for the away team.
Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, Hiroshima's Ezequiel is on target but unsuccessful.
Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 76, Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Kawasaki have a goal kick.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, Kawasaki have been awarded a penalty...
Yu Kobayashi gives Kawasaki a 5-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Kawasaki make their fifth substitution with Akihiro Ienaga replacing Ao Tanaka.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Taisei Miyashiro of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Hiroshima takes a corner from the left.
Hiroshima drives forward and Shunki Higashi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Kawasaki's Taisei Miyashiro has run offside.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Ezequiel (Hiroshima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
The match is over. Final score 5-1.
Yuya Asano puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 5-1.
